days.title: Financial Awareness
days.prompt: Take a moment to reflect on your current financial situation. What emotions come up when you think about money? Write about your relationship with money without judgment.

days.title: Money Mindset
days.prompt: What beliefs about money did you learn growing up? Which of these beliefs serve you today, and which might be holding you back?

days.title: Financial Goals
days.prompt: Describe your ideal financial situation one year from now. What specific steps can you take this month to move closer to that vision?
